content: X-BT-GR Stainless steel threaded studs Threaded stud for fastening grating and checker plate to steel ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Threaded studs & standoffs- - - ### FEATURES:Features No rework necessary on coated steel – corrosion protection remains intact Secure – creates a true weld to the base material for an extremely strong hold and high loading capacity Portable, cordless system – eliminates the need for long electric supply cords Fast – ideal for fastening directly to coated or treated steel Corrosion-resistant – suitable for marine, offshore and petrochemical applications, power plants, etc. Applications Fastening gratings to steel structures using X-FCM-M or X-FCM-R grating discs and X-FCS grating elements Fastening cable trays, channels, struts, light-duty electrical installation (T-bars, instrumentation panels, junction boxes), fitting out and much more Fastening threaded rod to steel Fastening to fire coated (PFP) beams Fastening checker plate with X-FCP-R grating discs For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Steel Minimum thickness of base material (steel): 5/16 in Corrosion protection: Equivalent corrosion protection as A4(316) Technical Data | Base materials | Steel, Stainless steel, Cast iron | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 5/16 in | Corrosion protection | Equivalent corrosion protection as A4(316) | Environmental Conditions | Outdoor, areas with heavy industrial pollution | Material | Duplex stainless steel (1.4462) | Thread diameter | 0.31 in | Point type | Blunt tip | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2194344 - Threaded stud X-BT-GR M8/7 SN 8 - Package Size 100 pc
